quote: It's a very old word, it means 'to breathe into.' That's how it works: An angel breathes into men and shows us what to play, what to draw. How to find the truth of who we are and why we are here.
quote_letters: ITS A VERY OLD WORD IT MEANS TO BREATHE INTO THATS HOW IT WORKS AN ANGEL BREATHES INTO MEN AND SHOWS US WHAT TO PLAY WHAT TO DRAW HOW TO FIND THE TRUTH OF WHO WE ARE AND WHY WE ARE HERE
